name: UBX-NAV-TIMEUTC
description: UTC time solution. Note that during a leap second there may be more or less than 60 seconds in a minute. See the description of leap seconds in the integration manual for details.

fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch. See section iTOW timestamps in the integration manual for details.

fields.name: valid
fields.description: Validity Flags: bit 0: validTOW (U:1) - 1 = Valid Time of Week; bit 1: validWKN (U:1) - 1 = Valid Week Number; bit 2: validUTC (U:1) - 1 = Valid UTC Time. Bits 7-4: utcStandard (U:4) - UTC standard identifier (Not supported for protocol versions less than 15.00). Values: 0 = Information not available, 1 = Communications Research Labratory (CRL), Tokyo, Japan, 2 = National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), 3 = U.S. Naval Observatory (USNO), 4 = International Bureau of Weights and Measures (BIPM), 5 = European laboratories, 6 = Former Soviet Union (SU).
